title: Parameters for LiDAR TransFusion Node
$comment: This schema is not considered in CI workflow. See https://github.com/autowarefoundation/autoware.universe/pull/8205#issuecomment-2255074224.

cloud_capacity.description: Capacity of the point cloud buffer (should be set to at least the maximum theoretical number of points).

onnx_path.description: A path to ONNX model file.

engine_path.description: A path to TensorRT engine file.

densification_num_past_frames.description: A number of past frames to be considered as same input frame.

densification_world_frame_id.description: A name of frame id where world coordinates system is defined with respect to.

circle_nms_dist_threshold.description: A distance threshold between detections in NMS.

iou_nms_target_class_names.description: An array of class names to be target in NMS.

iou_nms_search_distance_2d.description: A maximum distance value to search the nearest objects.

iou_nms_threshold.description: A threshold value of NMS using IoU score.

yaw_norm_thresholds.description: A thresholds array of direction vectors norm, all of objects with vector norm less than this threshold are ignored.

score_threshold.description: A threshold value of confidence score, all of objects with score less than this threshold are ignored.
